resources.string: This is the Accessibility Service that will allow the bot process to interact with the screen like tapping and swiping via gestures.\n\nNOTE: If the Toast message does not pop up immediately, disable and enable this again. Seeing the Toast message appear on the screen indicates that the Accessibility Service is now running!
This app requires its Accessibility Service to be turned on to allow the bot to navigate through the game.
This app requires that it is granted Overlay Permission to display the START/STOP Floating Action Button.
